body_html: @jart I actually don't know the answer to the question though :-) I'm not sure if cuDNN (yes in cudnn_rnn) is fusing the outputs from both directions before sending to the next layer or not. I was looking for it in the docs and couldn't find it. I think it depends on what cuDNN itself is doing.
